attributes.action: Back  SNP MPs stand against tory Brexit
attributes.background:
We, Sovereign Scots, urge Scotland's representatives not to support the Prime Minister's brexit agreement. On our behalf please tell her
 'NOW IS NOT THE TIME to be dragging Scotland out of the EU against Her will.'

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

This petition seems to be asking MPs representing Scottish constituencies, not the UK Parliament and Government, for a specific action. 

How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote to vote against the agreement. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/

You could also sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/226509

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
